parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language in which you want to display the results. Valid values: zh and en. zh indicates Chinese, which is the default value. en indicates English.

parameters.name: Check
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the health check.

parameters.name: ExpectedStatuses
parameters.description: The expected status code, which is required if the health check protocol is HTTP.

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: HealthyThreshold
parameters.description: The healthy threshold of the health check.

parameters.name: HttpHost
parameters.description: The health check domain name, which is optional if the health check protocol is HTTP.

parameters.name: HttpPath
parameters.description: The health check path, which is required if the health check protocol is HTTP.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The interval at which the health check is performed.

parameters.name: Protocol
parameters.description:
The health check protocol. Valid values:

*   HTTP
*   TCP

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: The timeout period of responses to the health check. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: UnhealthyThreshold
parameters.description: The unhealthy threshold of the health check.
